BatchEnd.title: BatchEnd
BatchEnd.description: End indicates a batch has ended.

count.title: Count
count.description: The number of records the batch thinks it sent, so that receivers can detect data loss.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Specifies the reason the job ended.

message.title: Message
message.description: A message about why the job ended. Usually only relevent if the job failed.
